ygData.subject: Re: does Bard need charisma?
ygData.msgSnippet: yes it is believed higher charisma definitely makes your charms song last longer.  Dex and Str are melee abilities, Dex allowing you to miss less, and Str
ygData.messageBody:
yes it is believed higher charisma definitely makes your charms song last
longer. Dex and Str are melee abilities, Dex allowing you to miss less, and
Str allowing you to hit harder (and carry more of course).

Shada Silverleaf, Level 47 Bard, Mithaniel Marr


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Dennis Chan [mailto:dchan17@...]
> Sent: Friday, June 25, 1999 4:52 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] does Bard need charisma?
>
>
> From: "Dennis Chan" <dchan17@...>
>
> can anyone answer that? do we need it for charm song?
> or do u guys prefer DEX and STR
>
